name: Abyssal Echo (NinetailedJay)
description:
Abyssal Echo is an infinite runner-ish (Ends at 10,000m which is a long way down) in which you are a plankton collecting drone. 

You can move horizontally, with the current always pulling you back to the middle. Holding 'Space'  will slow the descent in order to avoid tricky obstacles and collect the most plankton possible. 

This was a prototype game created for an assignment at my university in Unity. I had a lot of fun creating this game, and in the future, I would love to expand and refine the game to the point of a potential release.

All the 2D art was created by myself in Photoshop, the fonts and music were sourced online. Their references were included in my assignment document and were used under the 'fair use' act for educational purposes. 

There is no save function between sessions in this build!
